snippet.title: Poly-Control Danalock
snippet.description: This new Danalock smart lock boasts some welcome wireless network and aesthetic design options.

snippet.title: Wrangler Denim Spa jeans moisturize your nether regions
snippet.description: Wrangler claims its new line of moisturizing jeans will soothe your skin and even fight cellulite thanks to fabric infused with ingredients like aloe vera and algae extracts.

snippet.title: Insteon home automation adds unofficial Nest support
snippet.description: Owners of the Insteon Hub will be able to control Nest's Learning Thermostat alongside smart LEDs, motion detectors, wireless cameras, and other connected devices, within Insteon's app.

snippet.title: 'Anchorman' news team recounts year in Yahoo searches
snippet.description: In this video, actor Will Ferrell and friends "report" on the year in Yahoo searches, reprising their roles from the film and its upcoming sequel.

snippet.title: Luxury aboard the Orient Express' British Pullman
snippet.description: Road Trip 2011: CNET gets a taste of the best that can be had on a train--the Venice-Simplon Orient Express' British Pullman, an 11-carriage exercise in luxury and good times.

snippet.title: Go ahead and spill on this nanotech menswear
snippet.description: Indochino's new line of menswear comes with a protective coating that supposedly repels liquids and stains and helps keep you smelling good.

snippet.title: Caffeine-infused lingerie claims to blast fanny fat
snippet.description: The latest attempt at a quick fat fix comes in the form of slinky undergarments made from a fabric infused with vitamin E and caffeine.

snippet.title: NASA turns to open-source problem-tracking databases
snippet.description: The space agency will begin using new software written using Bugzilla tools to track and analyze problems with the Space Shuttle and Space Station programs.

snippet.title: Girl looks for cell signal, steps on rattlesnake nest
snippet.description: In a rural area outside San Diego, a teenage girl is snakebit just because she wanted to text her boyfriend and call her mom. Life can be cruel.

snippet.title: Apple X11 1.1.2 [Update 2006] (#2): Problems launching OpenOffice, fix
snippet.description: Apple X11 1.1.2 [Update 2006] (#2): Problems launching OpenOffice, fix
